tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE medical_literature(
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR,
  authors VARCHAR,
  publication_date DATE,
  category VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    researcher TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR,
  author VARCHAR,
  published_date DATE,
  content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE authors (
  author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR,
  affiliation VARCHAR,
  email VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE references (
  reference_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  article_id INT,
  author_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES articles(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (author_id) REFERENCES authors(author_id)
)
